original_title: エモい女の子/恥じらいAV出演（デビュー）/涼風えみ（23）/社会人一年目/身長157cm/Bカップ/人見知りでシャイな性格
overview: The first is Emi Suzukaze, a 23-year-old member of society who is currently living alone in Kansai. She decided to make an AV appearance for the first time after being scouted in Shibuya, which she visited on her business trip two months ago. She has a pretty shy personality, and her first shoot was "if there are few people", so she decided to take a gonzo this time. Ryofu-san reveals her stunningly well-shaped hips. She is shy and she seems to like H things quite a lot ... Among them, he said that he likes "back" the most, and because of his soft body, the scenery of his hips when he pokes from behind is good. Fall down and ello ~~~ (salting)
title: Emotional Girl/Embarrassing AV Debut/Emi Suzuka (23)/First-Year Office Worker/157 cm Tall/B-Cup/Timid and Shy Personality
